titleStmt.title: The 14. of September. A relation of many memorable passages from Rome, Italy, Spaine, France, Germany, the Lovv-Countries, the Palatinate, and other places with some famous exploits performed at Bergen-Vpzom since the 4. of this moneth, stilo nouo.
Relation of many memorable passages from Rome, Italy, Spaine, France, Germany, the Low-Countries, the Palatinate, and other places.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nathaniel Butter, Barthol. Downes, and William Shefford,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 21295 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; last two leaves torn, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
